info.brief_description: There's an App where a user can Devolve from a human all the way to an organism.
info.description:
In today’s technological world, everyone has apps on their portable phones. Whether it be for playing, work, news, or watching videos, there is always an app for anyone to enjoy. But there is one rare app that few people know. Lately, a mysterious app appeared in every phone and tablet called De-Evolve. The purpose of this app is to devolve the host’s body or someone else’s into different classes down the evolutionary ladder. It acts as a time machine where the user can witness the past in the most impressive of ways. It can also devolve the world around the person to match the environment of the host’s devolved body along with both outfit and mentality. There's also the option of switching from De-Evolve to Evolve as the user can look into the future of what the human race will become. Not only that, but it can also act as a timer on how long the devolving takes and how long the effects will last, this will include leaving the devolved host’s change permanent.

There will be people that would like this app to have a much simpler life, to have a break from all the work they had to do, or to take part of a life long history. Though few would like to devolve themselves, they only use it for vacation purposes or understanding their roots from the very start. However, there would be few of them that do like to stay in the devolve state their in for the rest of their lives, let along back to the very start of life. Still, this app is the most sophisticated and unique of apps out there.

The rules are simple...

1. The De-Evolve App will work on one person, or a group of people
2. Nudity and Sex is allowed if you wish to add it.
3. There will be no violence in this story
4. Be creative

This is your story. This is your experience of the app. This is where you will experience your trip back or forward in time. Let us begin!
